name: Space Defense (Krzysztof Pacek)
description:
Back in 2018 I got inspired by a new gaming themed energy drink.
Then I and a newly meet artist worked on our first game.

This is the game we build back in 2018.

Now you can try it out.
The only objective is to destroy as many enemy's ships, as you can!

Move with WSAD or using arrows on your keyboard.

Shoot by pressing space bar.
